titles: Honoria and Mammon scene Metropolis or New-Troy : whereunto is added the Contention of Ajax and Ulysses for the armour of Achilles / written by James Shirley, Gent. ; as it was represented by young gentlemen of quality at a private entertainment of some persons of honour.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed for John Crook and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: "The contention of Ajax and Ulysses for the armor of Achilles" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
